secondary_uty module¶

Secondary utility functions sc, agr, eq_feat, and rnr.

secondary_uty.agr(n1, n2)¶

Verifies agreement between nodes for person, number, gender, and animacy features.

Parameters

  • n1 (Node) – First node to check agreement

  • n2 (Node) – Second node to check agreement

Returns

True if all relevant features agree between nodes

Return type

bool

secondary_uty.long_label(node)¶

Node long label in TXT/TEX according to Manager.file_type

Parameters

node (Node) – Node whose long label is required

Returns

long label in TXT/TEX according to Manager.file_type

Return type

str

secondary_uty.rnr(n1, n2)¶

Implements the Reflexive/Nonreflexive Rule for pronoun binding in simplexes.

Parameters

  • n1 (Node) – Node representing the pronoun

  • n2 (Node) – Node representing potential antecedent

Returns

True if reflexive/nonreflexive binding constraints are satisfied

Return type

bool

secondary_uty.sc(n1, n2)¶

Checks if basic syntactic conditions for pronoun binding are met, particularly the Precedes and Commands Rule.

Parameters

  • n1 (Node) – Node representing the pronoun

  • n2 (Node) – Node representing potential antecedent

Returns

True if syntactic conditions for binding are satisfied

Return type

bool
